attributes.action: have the next prime minister elected by the public and not a coronation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: gorden brown to ask for a general election at the earliest opportunity as he is just as bad as blair and was responsable for a pension fiasco, gold reseve plundering and more stealth taxes than anyone in history.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
